nodes.text: The ommni box was a notoriously hard-to-play instrument which enhanced music, and was commonly used in jizz. It was usually used as an amplifier to attenuate and alter the bass aspects of the music, with such sophisticated parts as the thwee and bwom pedals. Tech Mo'r played one for Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes in Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina.
In Darth Maul: Shadow Hunter, Ommni Box is misspelled as omni box.
